frame.name: Enforcing
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> acts to ensure that a <fen>Rule</fen> (often a constraint on behavior) is being followed. The <fen>Agent</fen>'s action is according to a general plan for <fen>Rule</fen>s (such that implicit in the <fen>Rule</fen> is the affordance to certain entities to ensure that the <fen>Rule</fen> is followed). The <fen>Rule</fen> may be specified for the <fen>Duration</fen> for which it is in effect.
<ex>Why don't <fex name="Agent">we</fex> <t>enforce</t> <fex name="Rule">the 20000 gun laws currently on the books across the nation</fex>?</ex> <ex><fex name="Medium">Computer systems</fex> can <fex name="Manner">ruthlessly</fex> <t>enforce</t> <fex name="Rule">rules and standards</fex> <fex name="Duration">indefinitely</fex>.</ex> <ex>Can <fex name="Agent">a landlord</fex> <target>enforce</target> <fex name="Rule">rules</fex> <fex name="Focal_participant">upon tenants</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rule
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Rule</fen> is the set of constrants on behavior that the <fen>Agent</fen> implements (i.e., forces others to obey or face consequences).
<ex>Employers should strictly <t>enforce</t> <fex name="Rule">a prohibition against use of any substance that may affect a worker's physical or mental ability</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of time for which the <fen>Rule</fen> is or is not in effect.
<ex>The coat-and-tie dress code for the Plimsoll Club in the World Trade Center was strictly <t>enforced</t> <fex name="dur">for years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the Agent enforces the <fen>Rule</fen>.
<ex>That particular regulation was only <t>enforced</t> <fex name="tim">in 1920</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Rule</fen> is or is not enforced.
<ex>For this reason they <t>enforced</t> the settlement system <fex name="place">in America</fex> just as strictly as in Germany.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs under which the Agent puts the <fen>Rule</fen> into effect.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>A cause, reason, or other explanation for the enforcing of the <fen>Rule</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Focal_participant
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual or group who is obligated to follow the <fen>Rule</fen>.
<ex>Can a landlord <target>enforce</target> rules <fex name="Focal_participant">upon tenants</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen>, often an institution, governmental organization, or arm thereof, puts into effect (i.e., enforces) a <fen>Rule</fen>.
<ex>Can <fex name="Agent">a landlord</fex> <target>enforce</target> rules upon tenants?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> describes some state of the <fen>Agent</fen>, or provides additional characterization of the event.
<ex>The coat-and-tie dress code for the Plimsoll Club in the World Trade Center was <fex name="Manner">strictly</fex> <t>enforced</t> for years.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> is an intermediate action done by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to enforce the <fen>Rule</fen>.
<ex>Since 1961 the church has <t>enforced</t> it <fex name="mea">by "disfellowshipping" or expelling un-repentant members who wilfully accept prohibited blood components</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> enforces the <fen>Rule</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes how fully the <fen>Rule</fen> was enforced.</def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the medium through which the rule was enforced. It may occur in the same syntactic position as the Agent. <ex>The rules will be <t>enforced</t> <fex name="Medium">by a new computer system that tracks people's movements</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Outcome
FE.definition: <def-root>The Outcome is the failure or success of enforcing the rule.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: enforce.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: compel compliance with (a law, rule, or obligation).
